system.requirements:
Tier 1: Untouchable E.Adv, Willpower 30
Aptitudes: Finesse, Willpower
system.effect: Enemies within Willpower Bonus metres of the Untouchable suffer -10 to all Charm and Deceive Tests.

description.value: Enemies within Willpower Bonus metres of the Untouchable suffer -10 to all Charm and Deceive Tests.
